page.title: 18LEISURE AROUND BYFIELD
page.content: THE THINGS PEOPLE LIKE DOING BEST IN BYFIELD ARE SWIMMING,CRICKET,SQUASH, TENNIS AND WALKING.IN BYFIELD WE HAVE GOT A CRICKET PITCH AND TENNIS COURTS. AROUND BYFIELD THERE ARE LOTS OF FOOTPATHS THAT GO THROUGH NICE COUNTRY- SIDE.MOST PEOPLE TAKE PART IN ONE OF THESE ACTIVITIES ON 2 DAYS PER WEEK. MOST PEOPLE SAID THAT THEY WOULD LIKE A SPORTS CENTRE IN THE VILLAGE WITH BADMINTON COURTS,SQUASH COURTS AND A SWIMMING POOL.LEISURE IN AND AROUND UPPER BODDINGTON IS CENTRED AROUND ORGANISATIONS THAT CATER FOR DIFFERENT VARIETIES.IN BODDINGTON,SPORTS INCLUDE FOOTBALL AND CRICKET WITH SAILING AND WINDSURFING ON THE RESERVOIR.THE PARISH CHURCH AND METHODIST CHAPEL HAVE FUND- RAISING EVENTS LIKE COFFEE MORNINGS, FETES,GARDEN PARTIES AND JUMBLE SALE. BELL RINGING AND RUNNING THE VILLAGE HALL TAKES UP SPARE TIME TOO.
